info.name: Marketing Events API Collection
info.description:
These APIs allow you to interact with HubSpot's Marketing Events Extension. It allows you to:
* Create, Read or update Marketing Event information in HubSpot
* Specify whether a HubSpot contact has registered, attended or cancelled a registration to a Marketing Event.
* Specify a URL that can be called to get the details of a Marketing Event.

item.name: Create or update multiple marketing events

request.description: Upset multiple Marketing Event. If there is an existing Marketing event with the specified id, it will be updated; otherwise a new event will be created.

header.description: Added as a part of security scheme: apikey
Added as a part of security scheme: apikey

request.description: Bulk delete a number of marketing events in HubSpot

header.description: Added as a part of security scheme: apikey

query.description: The account id associated with the marketing event

variable.description: (Required) The id of the marketing event
(Required) The new subscriber state for the HubSpot contacts and the specified marketing event. For example: 'register', 'attend' or 'cancel'.

item.name: Read participations breakdown by Marketing Event internal identifier

query.description: The identifier of the Contact. It may be email or internal id.
The participation state value. It may be REGISTERED, CANCELLED, ATTENDED, NO_SHOW
The limit for response size. The default value is 10, the max number is 100
The cursor indicating the position of the last retrieved item.

variable.description: (Required) The internal id of the marketing event in HubSpot.

request.description: Read Marketing event's participations breakdown with optional filters by internal identifier marketingEventId.
